trans-unit.source: Covariance and Contravariance (Visual Basic) | Microsoft Docs
trans-unit.target: Covarianza y contravarianza (Visual Basic) | Documentos de Microsoft

trans-unit.source: Covariance and Contravariance (Visual Basic)
trans-unit.target: Covarianza y contravarianza (Visual Basic)

trans-unit.source: In Visual Basic, covariance and contravariance enable implicit reference conversion for array types, delegate types, and generic type arguments.
trans-unit.target: En Visual Basic, covarianza y contravarianza habilitar la conversión de referencia implícita de tipos de matriz, tipos de delegado y argumentos de tipo genérico.

trans-unit.source: Covariance preserves assignment compatibility and contravariance reverses it.
trans-unit.target: Covarianza mantiene la compatibilidad de asignación y la contravarianza invierte.

trans-unit.source: The following code demonstrates the difference between assignment compatibility, covariance, and contravariance.
trans-unit.target: El código siguiente muestra la diferencia entre la compatibilidad con la asignación, covarianza y contravarianza.

trans-unit.source: Covariance for arrays enables implicit conversion of an array of a more derived type to an array of a less derived type.
trans-unit.target: Covarianza de matrices, permite la conversión implícita de una matriz de un tipo más derivado a una matriz de un tipo menos derivado.

trans-unit.source: But this operation is not type safe, as shown in the following code example.
trans-unit.target: Pero esta operación no es seguro, tal como se muestra en el ejemplo de código siguiente.

trans-unit.source: Covariance and contravariance support for method groups allows for matching method signatures with delegate types.
trans-unit.target: Covarianza y contravarianza grupos de métodos permite para hacer coincidir las firmas de método con tipos de delegado.

trans-unit.source: This enables you to assign to delegates not only methods that have matching signatures, but also methods that return more derived types (covariance) or that accept parameters that have less derived types (contravariance) than that specified by the delegate type.
trans-unit.target: Esto permite asignar a los delegados no solo los métodos que coincidan las firmas, sino también los métodos que devuelven que más derivados (covarianza) de tipos o que acepta parámetros que tienen tipos menos derivados (contravarianza) que el especificado por el tipo de delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Variance in Delegates (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/covariance-contravariance/variance-in-delegates.md) and [Using Variance in Delegates (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/covariance-contravariance/using-variance-in-delegates.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulte [varianza en delegados (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/covariance-contravariance/variance-in-delegates.md) y [utilizar varianza en delegados (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/covariance-contravariance/using-variance-in-delegates.md).

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows covariance and contravariance support for method groups.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra la covarianza y contravarianza soporte para grupos de métodos.

trans-unit.source: In .NET Framework 4 or later Visual Basic support covariance and contravariance in generic interfaces and delegates and allow for implicit conversion of generic type parameters.
trans-unit.target: En .NET Framework 4 o posterior Visual Basic admiten la covarianza y contravarianza en interfaces y delegados genéricos y permiten la conversión implícita de parámetros de tipo genérico.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Variance in Generic Interfaces (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/covariance-contravariance/variance-in-generic-interfaces.md) and [Variance in Delegates (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/covariance-contravariance/variance-in-delegates.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulte [varianza en Interfaces genéricas (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/covariance-contravariance/variance-in-generic-interfaces.md) y [varianza en delegados (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/covariance-contravariance/variance-in-delegates.md).

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows implicit reference conversion for generic interfaces.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra la conversión implícita de referencia para las interfaces genéricas.

trans-unit.source: A generic interface or delegate is called *variant* if its generic parameters are declared covariant or contravariant.
trans-unit.target: Una interfaz genérica o delegado se denomina *variante* si sus parámetros genéricos se declaran covariantes o contravariante.

trans-unit.source: Visual Basic enables you to create your own variant interfaces and delegates.
trans-unit.target: Visual Basic le permite crear sus propias interfaces y delegados variantes.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Creating Variant Generic Interfaces (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/covariance-contravariance/creating-variant-generic-interfaces.md) and [Variance in Delegates (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/covariance-contravariance/variance-in-delegates.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulte [crear Interfaces genéricas variantes (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/covariance-contravariance/creating-variant-generic-interfaces.md) y [varianza en delegados (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/covariance-contravariance/variance-in-delegates.md).

trans-unit.target: Muestra cómo crear interfaces variantes personalizadas.

trans-unit.target: Muestra cómo admiten la covarianza y contravarianza en los <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>y <xref:System.IComparable%601>interfaces pueden ayudarle a reutilizar el código.</xref:System.IComparable%601> </xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>

trans-unit.source: [Variance in Delegates (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/covariance-contravariance/variance-in-delegates.md)
trans-unit.target: [Varianza en delegados (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/covariance-contravariance/variance-in-delegates.md)

trans-unit.source: Discusses covariance and contravariance in generic and non-generic delegates and provides a list of variant generic delegates in the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: Describe la covarianza y contravarianza en delegados genéricos y no genéricos y proporciona una lista de delegados genéricos variantes en .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: [Using Variance in Delegates (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/covariance-contravariance/using-variance-in-delegates.md)
trans-unit.target: [Utilizar varianza en delegados (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/covariance-contravariance/using-variance-in-delegates.md)

trans-unit.source: Shows how to use covariance and contravariance support in non-generic delegates to match method signatures with delegate types.
trans-unit.target: Muestra cómo utilizar la compatibilidad con la covarianza y contravarianza en delegados no genéricos para hacer coincidir las firmas de método con tipos de delegado.

trans-unit.source: [Using Variance for Func and Action Generic Delegates (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/covariance-contravariance/using-variance-for-func-and-action-generic-delegates.md)
trans-unit.target: [Usar la varianza para Func y Action Generic Delegates (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/covariance-contravariance/using-variance-for-func-and-action-generic-delegates.md)

trans-unit.source: Shows how covariance and contravariance support in the `Func` and `Action` delegates can help you reuse code.
trans-unit.target: Muestra cómo admiten la covarianza y contravarianza en los `Func` y `Action` delegados pueden ayudarle a reutilizar el código.
